member.name: P:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Request.Headers.origin_
member.summary: A lens from State -> Origin option, accessing the optional Origin header.

member.name: P:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Request.Headers.accessControlRequestMethod_
member.summary: A lens from State -> AccessControlRequestMethod option, accessing the optional Access-Control-Request-Method header.

member.name: P:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Request.Headers.accessControlRequestHeaders_
member.summary: A lens from State -> AccessControlRequestHeaders option, accessing the optional Access-Control-Request-Headers header.

member.name: T:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Request.Headers
member.summary: Optics for request headers, usually given as lenses from State -> 'a option, where 'a is a strongly typed representation of an optional header. Headers may be added and removed by using the common Freya optic functionality with Option values.

member.name: T:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Request
member.summary: Optics for working with individual elements of the request as part of the Freya state, including access to typed data using the Freya Types libraries where implemented.

member.name: P:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Response.Headers.accessControlMaxAge_
member.summary: A lens from State -> AccessControlMaxAge option, accessing the optional Access-Control-Max-Age header.

member.name: P:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Response.Headers.accessControlExposeHeaders_
member.summary: A lens from State -> AccessControlExposeHeaders option, accessing the optional Access-Control-Expose-Headers header.

member.name: P:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Response.Headers.accessControlAllowOrigin_
member.summary: A lens from State -> AccessControlAllowOrigin option, accessing the optional Access-Control-Allow-Origin header.

member.name: P:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Response.Headers.accessControlAllowMethods_
member.summary: A lens from State -> AccessControlAllowMethods option, accessing the optional Access-Control-Allow-Methods header.

member.name: P:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Response.Headers.accessControlAllowHeaders_
member.summary: A lens from State -> AccessControlAllowHeaders option, accessing the optional Access-Control-Allow-Headers header.

member.name: P:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Response.Headers.accessControlAllowCredentials_
member.summary: A lens from State -> AccessControlAllowCredentials option, accessing the optional Access-Control-Allow-Credentials header.

member.name: T:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Response.Headers
member.summary: Optics for response headers, usually given as lenses from State -> 'a option, where 'a is a strongly typed representation of an optional header. Headers may be added and removed by using the common Freya optic functionality with Option values.

member.name: T:Freya.Optics.Http.Cors.Response
member.summary: Optics for working with individual elements of the response as part of the Freya state, including access to typed data using the Freya Types libraries where implemented.
